r s e	Code	Array		Pass / Fail
		0123456789AB

1 1 1	(0,1)	200000000000	Pass
1 2 2	(1,2)	120000000000	Pass
1 2 3	(1,3)	122000000000	Pass

1 8 8	(7,8)	111111120000	Pass

		111111110111

		111111111111

3 3 5	(2,5)	002220000000	Pass
3 7 9	(6,9)	001110222000	Pass
3 2 10	(1,10)	022222222200	Pass
		011111111100

4 2 4	(1,4)	022200000000	Pass
4 4 5	(3,5)	011220000000	Pass
4 5 5	(4,5)	011120000000	Pass
4 4 6	(3,6)	011122000000	Pass
4 2 6	(1,6)	022222000000	Pass
4 6 7	(5,7)	011112200000	Pass
4 7 7	(6,7)	011111200000	Pass
4 7 8	(6,8)	011111220000	Pass
4 6 9	(5,9)	011112222000	Pass
4 1 9	(0,9)	222222222000	Pass
4 1 10	(0,10)	222222222200	Pass
4 11 12	(10,12)	111111111122	Pass
4 1 12	(0,12)	222222222222	Pass
		111111111111

5 3 4	(2,4)	002200000000	Pass
5 8 8	(7,8)	001100020000	Pass
5 6 7	(5,7)	001102210000	Pass
		001101110000

Total = 12 * 5 = 60-1-3-7 = 49

I might need more tests for
right neighbors.
